wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Cockerill (28 February 1935 – 4 November 2010) was a professional footballer, born in Sheffield, who played in the Football League as a defender for Huddersfield Town and Grimsby Town.His sons Glenn and John were also professional footballers.Cockerill died on 3 November 2010.
